description: At each step, record how many 1's, 2's, etc. have been seen so far in the sequence.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
crossrefs: A030717 is the tabular version of this sequence.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _James Propp_
extensions: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Dec 14 2006
